mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as store_name,c.name as workunit_name,e.name as subtype_name ,f.name as prod_name,f.style as prod_style,f.spec as prod_spec ,g.name as brand_name from ems_b2inotify a inner join ems_store b on a.store_id=b.id inner join ems_workunit c on a.workunit_id=c.id inner join ems_equipment d on a.ecode=d.ecode inner join ems_equipmentsubtype e on d.subtype_id=e.id inner join ems_equipmentprod f on d.prod_id=f.id inner join ems_brand g on d.brand_id=g.id where store_id in (select store_id from sys_userstore where user_id='admin' and edit='Y') and a.ishandled='N'
